mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (user_id, notice_title, notice_content) VALUES ( #{userDto.id}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT t2.user_id id, t2.email, t2.name, t2.role, t1.notice_id, t1.notice_title, t1.notice_content, t1.create_time FROM notice t1 JOIN user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
